root.name: Dungeonland
root.description: OverviewDungeonland is a multiplayer ARPG PC game from developer Critical Studio and published by Paradox Interactive, it is set in a 'theme park' and has three companions embark on a journey through each section of the park whilst a 4th player can act as the Dungeon Maestro and set traps and spawn monsters in attempts to kill the other players.System RequirementsOperating system: Windows Vista / Windows 7Processor: Dual Core 2.6GHzMemory: 4GB RAMHard disk space: 4GBVideo: DirectX 9.0 compatible card with 512MB (minimum Nvidia GeForce 8000, AMD Radeon HD 2000)Sound: DirectX Compatible Sounds CardDirectXÂ®: DirectX 9.0c
